Когда Overwatch 2 вышел в 2022 году, это был полный провал. Но сейчас, благодаря адовой системе монетизации, у игры появился бюджет, каждый сезон выкают новые карты, новые скины, раз в 2 сезона делают новых персонажей и новые режимы. Напоминаю, что в старом всеми любимом классическом овервоче персонажи выходили раз в 2 года, а новых режимов так вообще не появилось с 2016 года. 

За такие слова в комьюнити убивают, но игра реально становится лучше и развивается сейчас

Probably one of the worst games out there right now. Yes it's free to play, yes you can play it casually, but no you can't have fun. The QuickPlay is so sweaty and everyone is trying harder than in ranked and then get unbelievably toxic in the text chat. They are monetizing the game more than they care to even update and balance the game. Only recently starting to release new content for the first time in like 5 years, updating and over tweaking heroes each season and mid season patch (the only time they patch the game). Literally getting two updates a season (an update every 30 days) and leave you bored out of your mind with nothing to do in the game after the first week of the "new content". But don't worry, they update the shop each week but don't bother to balance their over tweaked decisions until a month later. They leave the game unfun and sweaty for months at a time because they buff a single hero beyond all others like Junkerqueen getting 2x healing and building her ult to 70% in the few seconds just after ulting; they left her that broken for an entire month and people just abused it the entire time and then say "skill issue" because your team didn't have a Junkerqueen mirror. But yeah don't worry, they'll release a mercy skin worth 25 dollars by itself and make millions and not put a dime of that money towards better and more frequent updates.

Do not play this game. Overwatch 2 is awful and is dying a slow painful death. This is Blizzard's last attempt to save the game from being dead. My friends and I were all excited to play this when it came out. We played almost everyday for like 2 months until everyone dropped the game. 

Overwatch 2 is a update for the first game. Barely any changes were made to the maps, gameplay, or characters. The changes that were made were for the benefit of the company and not the consumer. 

They removed lootboxes and removed leveling up and getting random items every couple of hours when you played. They replaced it by adding a shop where you can buy skins. Okay that sounds better. Except every skin is around 20 dollars. The skins they are making look like garbage. No skin in any game should be 20 dollars. Now after playing Overwatch 2 for all this time, I never earned anything. No new unlocks after 200 hours of game time. You can earn points from doing challenges everyday and save up to the 20 dollars. But that takes around half a year until you reach that point. Compared to Overwatch 1 where you could earn credits from lootboxes and get the skin you wanted in about a week or even sooner if you were lucky. 

They promised PVE content and then just cancelled it entirely. The PVE content we have now is exactly the same as the PVE content we got in Overwatch 1, but now you have to pay for it. It used to be free. I believe they never intended to give us PVE and only made it up so they can get away with calling it a "sequel" knowing they were just going to be changing the shop.

They have a battlepass now. There is nothing good in any of the battlepasses we have gotten. You have to pay for the battlepass.

You have to pay for characters now, they used to be free. If you didn't have Overwatch 1 before, you now either have to play a bunch of hours to unlock characters that were always free or pay money to unlock them. 

The balancing is fucked. The game is a buggy mess. They refuse to balance characters until a season is over. So if they make a character way too strong, then the entire playerbase has to deal with it for two months. 

5v5 sucks. The entire game turns into everyone just picking the same five characters and steamrolling everyone. 

They have like two game modes. Push a robot back and forth, or push a payload to a destination. They have arcade mode, but you don't earn anything anymore from arcade so why bother. 

Overwatch 2 is a bad game. Every change made was for the benefit of Blizzard. It is designed to suck money out of the player before Blizzard eventually kills the game off when the playerbase is dead. If you are coming back to play again, don't it is far worst. If you want to start the game for the first time, don't its not worth it. 

The only reason I bothered playing on steam was to give it a bad review that it deserves because you can't review games on battle.net. 

Overwatch 2 is bad and one of the worst sequels I have ever played.
Game is a complete cash grab. Will never be like the Overwatch 1 days.

I've seen your rise and fall. Rest in peace.

Overwatch 2, quel gâchis ! J'attendais ce jeu avec impatience, et tout ce que j'ai obtenu, c'est une énorme déception. Comment est-ce possible de prendre une franchise si réussie et de la réduire à ce niveau ?

Les personnages ? Ils étaient censés être nouveaux et excitants, mais ils ressemblent plus à des versions recyclées de ce qu'on a déjà vu. Où est l'effort pour innover et nous offrir quelque chose de vraiment neuf ?

Quant au gameplay, et bien rien de neuf, c’est tout comme le premier mais en pire ! Finalement, tous les personnages sont devenus des DPS no brain…

Les problèmes en ligne persistent, avec des déséquilibres frustrants et des latences qui ne devraient plus exister dans un jeu de ce calibre. Et les nouvelles cartes et modes de jeu ? Ils auraient pu être intéressants s'ils n'étaient pas noyés dans un ensemble qui se sent si familier et si terne.

Et n'oublions pas les microtransactions, qui semblent plus intéressées à vider nos poches qu'à enrichir l'expérience de jeu. C'est comme si le plaisir du joueur était devenu secondaire.

Je suis en colère, oui, mais c'est une colère née de la déception et de la tristesse. J'étais un fan dévoué d'Overwatch, et je voulais aimer cette suite. Mais Overwatch 2 ne tient pas ses promesses. C'est une ombre de ce qu'il aurait pu être, et c'est un coup dur pour ceux d'entre nous qui croyaient en cette franchise. Ce n'est pas le jeu que nous méritons, et Blizzard devrait le savoir. 

Quand l’argent domine… La faute de blizzard ? Ou des gens qui consomment malgré tout …. En tout cas Overwatch est pour moi un jeu du passé !
